About Me

Let me tell you a few things..

BIO

I am Microsoft Certified Professional and have 6 years of proven experience in the IT industry. I have worked on several projects in which I worked on user experience, Web Development, UI design, logo designs, and developing prototypes.

WEB DESIGN

I use WordPress to design captivating, responsive and interactive websites. My creative approach offers much more than just aesthetics.

Front-End Development

I plan, design, build, test and maintain scalable front end web applications.

GRAPHIC DESIGN

With a solid track record in designing websites,branding and apps, I deliver strong and user-friendly digital designs.
